pullrequest.title: quickstep is split into utility, solvers, update bodies and quickstep

content.raw:
Some comments:

 - `DYNAMIC_INERTIA` is not called in this refactor, but [it was called before](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/783d80d6567cebb1d350296145a87f311acfb38f/deps/opende/src/quickstep.cpp?at=default#cl-2214), so this will introduce changes in default simulation behavior.
 - There seems to be some code changes besides file splitting, maybe renaming `SOR_LCP` and `quickstep_sor_lcp` to `PGS_LCP` and `quickstep_pgs_lcp` is not going to affect readability of this PR significantly? @scpeters?  I am looking for a way to better compare original code with moved code... any ideas besides putting them side by side and manually diffing?
content.html:
Some comments:

  • DYNAMIC_INERTIA is not called in this refactor, but it was called before, so this will introduce changes in default simulation behavior.
  • There seems to be some code changes besides file splitting, maybe renaming SOR_LCP and quickstep_sor_lcp to PGS_LCP and quickstep_pgs_lcp is not going to affect readability of this PR significantly? @scpeters? I am looking for a way to better compare original code with moved code... any ideas besides putting them side by side and manually diffing?
